00013 function checkBarcode($barcode) {
00017   $result = XMLRPC_request('dev.upcdatabase.com', '/rpc', 'lookupUPC', array(XMLRPC_prepare($barcode)));
00018   if ($result[1] != 'Error: Invalid length') {
00019     if (strlen($barcode) == 12) {
00020       return 'upca';
00021     }
00022     else if (strlen($barcode) == 13) {
00023       return 'ean13';
00024     }
00025     else {
00026       return FALSE;
00027     }
00028   }
00029   else {
00030     return FALSE;
00031   }
00032 }

00040 function getBarcodeInfo($barcode) {
00044   $output = '';
00045   $output .= '<div id="upc">';
00046   $output .= '<img src="upcimg.php?upc=' . $barcode . '" />';
00047   $output .= '</div>';
00048 
00052   $result = XMLRPC_request('dev.upcdatabase.com', '/rpc', 'lookupUPC', array(XMLRPC_prepare($barcode)));
00053   /*if ($debug) */var_dump($result);
00054   if ($result[1]['found']) {
00055     extract($result[1], EXTR_PREFIX_ALL, 'barcode');
00056     $output .= <<<_HTML
00057     <div id="info">
00058       <table align="center">
00059         <tr>
00060           <td class="title">Country</td>
00061           <td>$barcode_issuerCountry</td>
00062         </tr>
00063         <tr>
00064           <td class="title">Description</td>
00065           <td>$barcode_description</td>
00066         </tr>
00067         <tr>
00068           <td class="title">Size</td>
00069           <td>$barcode_size</td>
00070         </tr>
00071       </table>
00072       <a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/editform.asp?upc=$barcode">Modify this entry</a>
00073       <a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/deleteform.asp?upc=$barcode">Delete this entry</a>
00074     </div>
00075 _HTML;
00076   }
00077   else {
00078     $output .= 'Product Not Found!<br />';
00079     $output .= '<a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/addform.asp?upc=' . $barcode . '">Add this item to the database</a>';
00080   }
00081 
00082   return $output;
00083 }
